import Card from"@mui/material/Card";import Tooltip from"@mui/material/Tooltip";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI components
import ArgonBox from"components/ArgonBox";import ArgonTypography from"components/ArgonTypography";import ArgonAvatar from"components/ArgonAvatar";// Images
import team1 from"assets/images/team-1.jpg";import team2 from"assets/images/team-2.jpg";import team3 from"assets/images/team-3.jpg";import team4 from"assets/images/team-4.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Messages(){const messagesAvatarStyles={border:_ref=>{let{borders:{borderWidth},palette:{white}}=_ref;return`${borderWidth[2]} solid ${white.main}`;},cursor:"pointer",position:"relative",ml:-1.5,"&:hover, &:focus":{zIndex:"10"}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",p:3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonTypography,{variant:"body2",color:"text",children:"Messages"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{display:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"2 New Messages",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonAvatar,{src:team1,alt:"team-1",size:"sm",sx:messagesAvatarStyles})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"1 New Messages",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonAvatar,{src:team2,alt:"team-2",size:"sm",sx:messagesAvatarStyles})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"13 New Messages",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonAvatar,{src:team3,alt:"team-3",size:"sm",sx:messagesAvatarStyles})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"7 New Messages",placement:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonAvatar,{src:team4,alt:"team-4",size:"sm",sx:messagesAvatarStyles})})]})]})});}export default Messages;
